description: Retrieves detailed information about the health of instances in your AWS Elastic Beanstalk. This operation requires enhanced health reporting.

parameters.name: AttributeNames
parameters.description: Specifies the response elements you wish to receive. To retrieve all attributes, set to All. If no attribute names are specified, returns a list of instances. (string) ---

nested_items.name: InstanceHealthList
nested_items.description: Detailed health information about each instance.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon EC2 instance.

nested_items.name: HealthStatus
nested_items.description: Returns the health status of the specified instance. For more information, see Health Colors and Statuses.

nested_items.name: Color
nested_items.description: Represents the color indicator that gives you information about the health of the EC2 instance. For more information, see Health Colors and Statuses.

nested_items.name: Causes
nested_items.description: Represents the causes, which provide more information about the current health status.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LaunchedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the EC2 instance was launched.

nested_items.name: ApplicationMetrics
nested_items.description: Request metrics from your application.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The amount of time that the metrics cover (usually 10 seconds). For example, you might have 5 requests ( request_count) within the most recent time slice of 10 seconds ( duration).

nested_items.name: RequestCount
nested_items.description: Average number of requests handled by the web server per second over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: StatusCodes
nested_items.description: Represents the percentage of requests over the last 10 seconds that resulted in each type of status code response.

nested_items.name: Status2xx
nested_items.description: The percentage of requests over the last 10 seconds that resulted in a 2xx (200, 201, etc.) status code.

nested_items.name: Status3xx
nested_items.description: The percentage of requests over the last 10 seconds that resulted in a 3xx (300, 301, etc.) status code.

nested_items.name: Status4xx
nested_items.description: The percentage of requests over the last 10 seconds that resulted in a 4xx (400, 401, etc.) status code.

nested_items.name: Status5xx
nested_items.description: The percentage of requests over the last 10 seconds that resulted in a 5xx (500, 501, etc.) status code.

nested_items.name: P999
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 0.1 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P99
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 1 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P95
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 5 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P90
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 10 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P85
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 15 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P75
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 25 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P50
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 50 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P10
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 90 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: CPUUtilization
nested_items.description: CPU utilization metrics for the instance.

nested_items.name: User
nested_items.description: Percentage of time that the CPU has spent in the User state over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: Nice
nested_items.description: Available on Linux environments only.

nested_items.name: System
nested_items.description: Available on Linux environments only.

nested_items.name: Idle
nested_items.description: Percentage of time that the CPU has spent in the Idle state over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: IOWait
nested_items.description: Available on Linux environments only.

nested_items.name: IRQ
nested_items.description: Available on Linux environments only.

nested_items.name: SoftIRQ
nested_items.description: Available on Linux environments only.

nested_items.name: Privileged
nested_items.description: Available on Windows environments only.

nested_items.name: LoadAverage
nested_items.description: Load average in the last 1-minute, 5-minute, and 15-minute periods. For more information, see Operating System Metrics.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: Deployment
nested_items.description: Information about the most recent deployment to an instance.

nested_items.name: VersionLabel
nested_items.description: The version label of the application version in the deployment.

nested_items.name: DeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the deployment. This number increases by one each time that you deploy source code or change instance configuration settings.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the deployment:
In Progress : The deployment is in progress.
Deployed : The deployment succeeded.
Failed : The deployment failed.

nested_items.name: DeploymentTime
nested_items.description: For in-progress deployments, the time that the deployment started.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The availability zone in which the instance runs.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance's type.

nested_items.name: RefreshedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the health information was retrieved.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Pagination token for the next page of results, if available.
